attributes.additional_details:
Signing this E-Petition makes your opinion clear that the United Kingdom Must Re-Instate Capital
Punishment with Forensic Technology in such an amazing position an innocent person would not be hanged today due to technology.

Benefits from Capital Punishment.

>Money Saved on Keeping a Prisoner in Our Prisons.

>It will make people think twice about commiting
horrific crimes.

>The countries crime rate will drop dramatically.


The government should Re-instate it and carry out Capital Punishment on convicts with a sentence of over 15 Years for extreme crimes.
